description: "On this map of Southeast Asia, numerous small islands, shoals and reefs are marked and named, especially in the South China Sea and around the Sunda and Maluku islands. Submarine cables to carry telegraph messages around the region are also shown."
title: "Malay, or East Indian Archipelago, with Burmah and Siam by William Shawe F.R.G.S [cartographic material]."
